Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.model

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.utils.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.psp12.model.GameState
public class GameState
extends Observable<Message>
Class that manages games instances, the board, the players and the current turn
Author:
Luca Morandini

      public GameState​(int maxPlayersCount) throws InvalidMaxPlayersException
      Constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      maxPlayersCount - max number of players allowed in the game
      Throws:
      InvalidMaxPlayersException - if max players count is not between 2 and 3
